 O.k. I should't be giving this away,but later I intend to post 
something about the remainig moon being a dormant Rocak robot. I may 
later activate it,but it will be low on power and can't do much but
1.spy from above
2.circle the earth
3defend itself
could you do that if I get around to it. I've written the story about 
Mustex finding this out,but not the one about him actually activating 
it so I could just keep it a vague hope if you can't.
